fields.name: Ambidextrous
fields.effect:
All melee weapons in your gear grid gain paired.
Ambidextrous cannot be used if there are any shields, two-handed, or heavy gear in your gear grid.

fields.name: Berserker
fields.effect: Once per showdown, you may spend Activation to suffer bash and the frenzy brain trauma.

fields.name: Clutch Fighter
fields.effect: While you have 3 or more bleeding tokens, gain +1 strength and +1 accuracy.

fields.name: Combo Master
fields.effect: On a perfect hit make 1 additional attack roll.

fields.name: Crazed
fields.effect: On a perfect hit, gain +1 insanity.

fields.name: Crossarm Block
fields.effect: Whenever you are hit, after hit locations are rolled, you may change 1 result to the arms hit location.

fields.name: Double Dash
fields.effect: During your act, once per round, you may spend Activation to gain Movement

fields.name: Extra Sense
fields.effect: You may dodge 1 additional time per round.

fields.name: Last Man Standing
fields.effect: While you are the only survivor on the showdown board, you may not gain bleeding tokens or be knocked down.

fields.name: Leader
fields.effect:
Whenever you encourage a survivor, they gain +1 speed token until the end of the round.
Once per hunt phase, you may inspire another survivor. They use your understanding and courage to resolve a hunt or story event.
(Example: if you have 3+ courage you can inspire another survivor to walk the path of the brave during Overwhelming Darkness.)

fields.name: Mighty Strike
fields.effect: On a perfect hit, gain +2 strength until the end of the attack.

fields.name: Monster Claw Style
fields.effect: Your Fist & Tooth attacks gain +1 accuracy, +1 strength and savage.

fields.name: Orator of Death
fields.effect:
Once per showdown, you may spend Activation to have all non-deaf survivors gain +2 insanity.
When you die, you encourage all survivors with your last words.

fields.name: Rhythm Chaser
fields.effect: On Arrival, gain +1 evasion token. When you are knocked down, if you don't have an instrument in your gear grid, remove all your +1 evasion tokens. Rhythm Chaser cannot be used if there is any heavy gear in your gear grid.

fields.name: Strategist
fields.effect: During the showdown setup, after placing terrain, you may add a Giant Stone Face or a Toppled Pillar terrain card to the showdown board.

fields.name: Thrill Seeker
fields.effect: Whenever you gain survival during the showdown phase, gain 1 additional survival.

fields.name: Timeless Eye
fields.effect: Your attack roll is a perfect hit on a result of 9 or 10. You cannot use Timeless Eye if you have the blind severe head injury.

fields.name: Tough
fields.effect: When rolling on a severe injury table, unless you roll a 1, add +1 to the result. (This does not include brain trauma. The result cannot exceed 10.)

fields.name: Tumble
fields.effect: When something would collide with you, roll 1d10. On a result of 6+, you successfully tumble out of harms way. Instead, place your survivor standing on the closest free space outside of the collision path.

fields.name: Unconscious Fighter
fields.effect: It takes 7 bleeding tokens to kill you.

fields.name: Acrobatics
fields.effect: When you are adjacent to the monster, you may spend Movement to place your survivor on any other space adjacent to the monster.

fields.name: Champion's Rite
fields.effect:
Before making an attack, you may add your understanding to your accuracy attribute for that attack.
Limit, once per showdown.

fields.name: Fated Blow
fields.effect: Once per showdown, you may give your next wound attempt +2 strength and Devastating 1.

fields.name: Carapace of Will
fields.effect: On Arrival, gain the Steadfast survivor status card. When you are attacked, if you have 2+ steadfast tokens, ignore a hit and remove all your steadfast tokens.

fields.name: Propulsion Drive
fields.effect: On Arrival, gain the Momentum survivor status card. When you attack, if you have 5+ momentum tokens, remove them all and roll 1d10. Gain that amount of luck and strength when attempting to wound the first selected hit location for this attack.

fields.name: Otherworldly Luck
fields.effect: During the hunt and settlement phase, whenever you roll on a table, you may add +1 to the roll result. This may not exceed the highest possible result of that table. (This includes Hunt Events, Story Events, Endeavors, Settlement Events, etc)

fields.name: Lure Epilepsy
fields.effect: Once per showdown, you may spend Activation to give yourself a seizure. You suffer a random brain trauma and are knocked down.

fields.name: Mammoth Hunting
fields.effect: Gain +1 strength when attacking from adjacent spaces outside the monster's facing and blind spot.

fields.name: Burning Focus
fields.effect: If you have 0 survival at the start of your act, gain 1 survival.

fields.name: Heroic
fields.effect: Once per showdown, if you are standing adjacent to the monster and have 3+ survival, you may spend all of your survival for one automatic hit that inflicts a critical wound.

fields.name: Ruthless
fields.effect: Whenever a survivor dies during the showdown, roll 1d10. On a 7+, gain a Skull basic resource.

fields.name: Unrelenting
fields.effect: If all of your attack rolls in an attack miss, you may spend 1 survival to re-roll all attack rolls.

fields.name: Headliner
fields.effect: When you become doomed or gain the priority target token, you may choose to gain +1 survival or +1 strength token.

fields.name: Tenacious
fields.effect: When your wound attempt on a hit location is a failure, you may put that hit location back on top of the deck instead of in the discard pile. Limit, once per round.

fields.name: Wardrobe Expert
fields.effect: When you suffer a severe injury at a hit location, you may archive a gear worn at that location to ignore it and gain +1 survival.

fields.name: Abyssal Sadist
fields.effect:
The first time you wound the monster each attack, gain +1 survival and +1 insanity.
Ignore the effects of the Fear of the Dark and Prey disorders.

fields.name: Seasoned Hunter
fields.effect: Whenever a random hunt event result is: 11, 22, 33, 44, 55, 66, 77, 88, 99, or 100, the event revealer gains +1 understanding and +1 courage.

fields.name: Trailblazer
fields.effect: The hunting party may start the hunt phase 1 space closer to the monster. At the start of the showdown, all survivors gain +1 survival and up to +1 insanity.

fields.name: Transcended Masochist
fields.effect: When you gain a bleeding token, gain +1 survival and +1 insanity. Ignore the effects of the Aichmophobia and Apathetic disorders.

fields.name: Blotted Out
fields.effect: Whenever you suffer a brain trauma, gain a bleeding token.

fields.name: Phantom Friend
fields.effect:
The first time you gain a resource during a showdown, you may feed it to your phantom friend. If you do, archive the resource and gain +1 evasion token.
Lose this token if you are deaf or become deaf during the showdown.

fields.name: Harvestman
fields.effect:
Gain +3 movement. Whenever you are knocked down, gain -1 movement token.
If you have the Tiny Arachnophobia disorder, you are too scared of spiders to imitate them and you cannot use this fighting art.

fields.name: Vengeance
fields.effect: When a survivor dies during the showdown, gain +4 survival and +1 strength token.

fields.name: Burning Ambition
fields.effect:
When you are instructed to skip the next hunt, ignore it.
The 'Skip Next Hunt' box on your survivor record sheet cannot be filled in.

fields.name: Defender
fields.effect:
When a survivor adjacent to you is knocked down, you may spend 1 survival. If you do, they stand and gain +1 survival from your words of encouragement.
You cannot use this if you have the shattered jaw severe injury.

fields.name: Purpose
fields.effect:
Your comrades make you strong enough to exceed the limits of death itself.
During the showdown, if you would gain a lethal number of bleeding tokens while there are any other standing survivors, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you live but are knocked down. You will not bleed to death until you gain another bleeding token.

fields.name: Sneak Attack
fields.effect: When you attack a monster from its blind spot, gain +4 strength for that attack.

fields.name: Trick Attack
fields.effect: Once per showdown, when you wound a monster from its blind spot, a survivor adjacent to you may gain the priority target token.

fields.name: Bloodzerker
fields.effect: Gain +1 strength for each of your bleeding tokens. When you have 3+ bleeding tokens, you lose yourself to the blood and are guardless!

fields.name: Glass Mask
fields.effect:
When you depart, you lightly cut your ears, rub blood all over your face, and wait for it to dry. Gain +3 insanity.
If you have Face Painting, you create a seal between your glass mask and your armor. Gain an additional +3 insanity.

fields.name: Invigorator
fields.effect: Gain +1 accuracy and +1 speed while you have no insanity.
